name: Fairy Cabs
description:
Fairy Cabs is celebrating their 20th anniversary. We're expanding more day by day and are in search of new colleagues. Do you have a little magic in you when it comes to customer service? Are you proficient on casting spells for on-time delivery? Do you have what it takes to curse those complaints away? Then you are perfect for working at Fairy Cabs.

All races and genders may apply!

IGMC Features
- Five levels on one location
- Two (renamable) MCs to pick from
- Get hired or fired!

Possible Features in the future
- Unlockable extra MC(s)
- Three new locations
- Different modes (Easy, normal, hard(?), Infinitive)
